channel.title: REST APIs on Sundar
channel.description: Recent content in REST APIs on Sundar

item.title: A no/low code developer platform for building ML & RPA solutions
item.description: This low code platform’s objective is to ease the lives of ML and RPA developers by providing a visual drag and drop interface to build solutions. Architected the entire platform right from ground up. Had created a framework for plugging in the custom blocks using python.

item.title: Events Management App
item.description: A progressive web app (PWA) place to find and manage events happening around you
